projectDescription: A React MVP project where I implemented a lot of functionality of the Netflix site, including signup/signin functionality, browse page and more in a Single Page Application.
Using the Scrimba platform, I built a ECommerce capstone project. Responsive design using some basic CSS and modular thanks to React, React Hooks and the Context API.

It's a simple To-Do site with an nice added bonus. But here I discovered a lot of the inner workings of the JS ecosystem. Webpack, Babel and SCSS are all used without relying too much on external tooling.

Made when there was little documentation on Godot, I experimented enough to make two games, Dodge The Creeps and Game Of Life, using Nim. Using this method of little to no hand-holding I got a deeper understanding of Nim and Godot.
